comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content:
Typo in title, text on the print reads "May" not "Mad"

And is that a date on the stamp, upper left?  It appears to read 5/2/14  (sorry, just realised I was reading the date as 5 Feb 14, it's actually meant to be 2 May, isn't it.)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Posted to Flickr in February, 2011. The photo was taken in Union Square, New York City. By no coincidence at all, Union Square also happened to be the address of the Bain photo agency.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of the 1/5/1914 May Day rally in Union Square were posted to Flickr on April 27, 2011:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5670044648/in/photostream]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Thanks to all for the helpful information - and for catching that typo in the title!  We will add to the record and make corrections.
